added.text: [Beta] Search results can now be filtered by source
[Beta] Search results may now be filtered by license

fixed.text: Fixed popover positioning under side panel tab controls
Fixed an issue where selecting a Discussions graphic on the map while one is already selected did not unselect the previous graphic
Updated CSS selector to apply underlined links on 404 pages
[Beta] Fixed issue where the experimental map filter stopped working on the new search route (/explore) after the route had switched to using the OGC API
Removed pluralized strings for language support due to problematic translation support in browsers
Fixed issue where selecting a dataset from the global nav search while on a dataset page would break the map

added.text: Added the ability in Hub Discussions for Channel moderators to hide or show individual posts
Added error notice for hidden Discussion posts

changed.text: Updated the Add Reaction button to use the latest calcite-related functionality

fixed.text: Resolved an issue where a secure feature service was generating an extra login prompt
Resolved image-upload editor bug for image card and rows
Fixed at-mention popovers support usernames with '@', '-' and '.' chars
Bumped @esri/hub-discussions@22.1.3 to support at-mentioning usernames containing @, -, and . chars
